channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Trump’s EPA plans to ignore health affects of air pollution
item.description: The Trump administration is planning to stop assigning value to human life when analyzing the costs and benefits of air pollution controls.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg announces new 'Meta Compute' initiative for its data center and AI projects
item.description: On the heels of Mark Zuckerberg announcing that Meta's former board member, Dina Powell McCormick, would be formally joining the company as president and vice chairman, the CEO has shared new details about her purview at the company. The executive will play a key role overseeing Meta's sprawling infrastructure investments as part of a newly announced initiative called Meta Compute."Meta is planning to build tens of gigawatts this decade, and hundreds of gigawatts or more over time," Zuckerberg said in an update. "How we engineer, invest, and partner to build this infrastructure will become a s...

item.title: Amazon says 97% of its devices can support Alexa+
item.description: Amazon is counting on its Alexa footprint to help it gain traction in the consumer AI race.

item.title: Snag a Feature-Packed Gaming Headset for Under $100
item.description: Corsair's updated Void Wireless sports Dolby Atmos and a lightweight, breathable fit.

item.title: Trump Administration Takes Stake in Major Critical Mineral Firm
item.description: The Pentagon is investing in Atlantic Alumina in a bid to boost U.S. gallium and alumina production and reduce reliance on China.

item.title: Right-Wing Influencers Have Flooded Minneapolis
item.description: Clips from creators in Minnesota have become primary evidence in attempts from the right-wing to justify ICE's surge on American cities.

item.title: Hell Yeah, an Action Figure Wave of ‘Star Wars’ Freaks
item.description: Dad, Taun We's here—as a 'Star Wars' Black Series action figure.

item.title: These are my favorite Switch 2 accessories
item.description: The Nintendo Switch 2 can be enjoyed right out of the box, but it’s even better with the right accessories. Some of these add-ons are more crucial than others, especially if you’re deciding what to buy early on. For example, a case and a screen protector can keep your console safe from scuffs, scratches, and […]

item.title: Why your LLM bill is exploding — and how semantic caching can cut it by 73%
item.description: Our LLM API bill was growing 30% month-over-month. Traffic was increasing, but not that fast. When I analyzed our query logs, I found the real problem: Users ask the same questions in different ways."What's your return policy?," "How do I return something?", and "Can I get a refund?" were all hitting our LLM separately, generating nearly identical responses, each incurring full API costs.Exact-match caching, the obvious first solution, captured only 18% of these redundant calls. The same semantic question, phrased differently, bypassed the cache entirely.So, I implemented semantic caching base...

item.title: GoFundMe Ignores Own Rules by Hosting a Legal-Defense Fund for the ICE Agent Who Killed Renee Good
item.description: The fundraiser for the ICE agent in the Renee Good killing has stayed online in seeming breach of GoFundMe’s own terms of service, prompting questions about selective enforcement.

item.title: Democrats should reject tech influence to win elections, Warren says
item.description: The path forward for the Democratic party after its 2024 defeat includes less tech influence and more populist policies, according to Sen. Elizabeth Warren (D-MA). Warren delivered this message in a speech at the National Press Club in Washington, DC on Monday, where she charted a vision for the future of a party that's still […]

item.title: Test du Minisforum MS-02 Ultra : voici le PC le plus compact du monde avec une GeForce RTX 5060
item.description: Testons le Minisforum MS-02 Ultra, le successeur spirituel du MS-01. La promesse ici est simple mais totalement déraisonnable : faire entrer un Core Ultra 9, 64 Go de RAM, une RTX 5060 et, tenez-vous bien, du réseau 25 GbE dans un châssis de moins de 5 litres.

item.title: Museum Kept Mammoth Fossils for 70 Years. They Turned Out to Be Something Else Entirely
item.description: The fossilized bones were far too young to belong to a woolly mammoth.

item.title: MacKenzie Scott Donates $45 Million to the Trevor Project
item.description: Jeff Bezos’ ex-wife has made a donation to the LGBTQ+ advocacy group that the organization calls “transformational.”

item.title: Devs don't trust AI code - but many say they still don't check it anyways
item.description: Although most developers don't fully trust AI code, only around half of them commit to always checking their work.

item.title: Test Sennheiser HDB630 : la claque audiophile en Bluetooth
item.description: Avec le HDB630, Sennheiser bouscule le sommet des casques Bluetooth haut de gamme et livre sans doute le meilleur casque à réduction de bruit du marché, toutes catégories confondues. Un casque qui cultive l'excellence sonore et technique sans tomber dans l'excès démonstratif.

item.title: Fintech firm Betterment confirms data breach after hackers send fake crypto scam notification to users
item.description: Hackers gained access to some Betterment customers’ personal information through a social engineering attack, then targeted some of them with a crypto-related phishing message.

item.title: How exclusionary ads can win over the right customers
item.description: Our research shows that sometimes the most effective way to market something is to say that it isn’t for them. Imagine you are searching for a new mattress online and find something surprising. The retailer displays an ad featuring a “Mattress Comfort Scale” running from 1 (soft) to 10 (firm), followed by the message that if your firmness preference is at either end, this mattress is not for you. Wait . . . what? A retailer telling someone not to buy its product? No way!...

item.title: Apple picks Google Gemini over ChatGPT for Siris AI overhaul
item.description: Apple has been trying to infuse AI into Siri for a few years now, and it'll continue with Google Gemini instead of ChatGPT.

item.title: Apple Taps Google Gemini to Give Siri an AI Glow-Up
item.description: Thanks to the news, Google has now become the fourth company to hit $4 trillion market value.

item.title: Rachat de Warner Bros : Paramount tente un coup de poker judiciaire pour évincer Netflix
item.description: Dans le feuilleton du rachat de Warner Bros par Netflix, Paramount aime jouer les trouble-fêtes. Après de multiples surenchères, Paramount choisit désormais la voie juridique pour connaître les contours de l'accord.

item.title: The Lego Icons Balrog Book Nook is a dollar away from its lowest price ever
item.description: The Lego Icons Balrog Book Nook is getting a rare price markdown at Amazon as of Jan. 12.

item.title: 11 Things We Learned From the ‘Stranger Things’ Finale Documentary
item.description: The behind-the-scenes doc 'One Last Adventure', highlighting the epic final season, is now streaming on Netflix.

item.title: Anker goes big with new whole home backup system
item.description: Homeowners in search of grid independence have another option today with the launch of Anker's Solix E10 big-ass battery system. It joins companies like Tesla and EcoFlow in offering whole-home backup solutions in the US market meant to counter blackouts and reduce monthly energy bills, or even eliminate them completely. The base $4,299 E10 system […]...

item.title: You can own a Samsung 65-inch OLED TV for under $900 with this under-half-price deal at Best Buy
item.description: The Samsung S84F OLED TV plummets in price thanks to Best Buy sale

item.title: Anker Solix just launched the E10 whole-home backup system, and preorders come with major perks
item.description: The Anker Solix E10 whole-home backup system is available for preorder with prices starting at $4,299.

item.title: Pourquoi ce trou noir est devenu 30 fois plus lumineux ?
item.description: Imaginez un instant à quel point un objet brillant comme un millier de soleils illuminerait le ciel. Comme un million de soleils. Un milliard de soleils. Et maintenant 10 000 milliards de soleils ! C’est impossible ? À concevoir pour nos simples esprits humains. Sans doute. Mais c’est bel et...

item.title: Apple gives up and lets Google take the AI wheel – Gemini will officially power Siri’s big AI upgrade this year
item.description: Apple's AI-powered Siri could finally arrive this year – and it'll be powered by Google's Gemini, the tech giants have surprisingly announced.

item.title: E.U. sets new conditions for Chinese EV imports to resolve dispute
item.description: The E.U. said that minimum import prices must be set at a level ‘appropriate to remove the injurious effects of the subsidization.’ China and the European Union said Monday they have agreed on steps toward resolving their dispute over the bloc’s imports of Chinese-made electric vehicles.

item.title: Paramount won't quit, files suit against Warner Bros. Discovery over rejected bid
item.description: Paramount Skydance just does not want to take no for an answer. After having multiple bids to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) rejected, including a recent hostile bid that the WBD board recommended that shareholders reject, Paramount is turning to the courts and mounting a proxy fight. In a letter to shareholders on Monday, Paramount CEO David Ellison said the company has filed suit in Delaware Chancery Court seeking more disclosure about WBD’s pending Netflix deal and the process that led to its acceptance. Paramount argues WBD hasn’t provided “basic information” shareholders need to eva...

item.title: Intelligence artificielle | Partenariat entre Apple et Google pour actualiser l’assistant Siri avec Gemini
item.description: Apple a conclu un partenariat pluri-annuel avec Google, qui va fournir au fabricant de l’iPhone ses modèles d’intelligence artificielle (IA) générative Gemini pour améliorer ses fonctionnalités d’IA, notamment une version renouvelée de l’assistant vocal Siri, selon une déclaration commune lundi.

item.title: Connor Storrie, Hudson Williams, and Seventeens Joshua are the Golden Globes most viral meet-cute
item.description: 'Heated Rivalry' stars Connor Storrie and Hudson Williams snapped a pic with Seventeen's Joshua backstage at the Golden Globes.

item.title: Les soldes frappent cette barre de son Harman Kardon avec -110 € : pour de l’audio Dolby Atmos et DTS:X immersif à bon prix
item.description: Grâce aux Soldes et à un code de réduction sur Rakuten, la barre de son Harman Kardon Enchant 900 passe de 499,99 euros à 389,20 euros.

item.title: Best Buy's winter sale is live with up to 50% off sitewide — here's every deal worth knowing about from Apple, LG, Samsung, and more
item.description: Best Buy just launched a massive winter sale, and I'm rounding up every deal worth buying, including up to 50% off TVs, laptops, appliances, headphones, and more.

item.title: Every foldable phone planned or rumored for 2026
item.description: Foldable phones used to be a fantasy, then a niche, and now it's a real market category will lots of options.

item.title: Developers have made $550 billion on Apple’s App Store since 2008
item.description: Apple says its services had a "record-breaking year," as Apple TV, Apple Music, and Apple Pay also soared.

item.title: Hytale finally launches this week with a bright future ahead
item.description: Hytale, the highly anticipated Minecraft-like adventure game that's been in development for a decade, is nearly here. After developer Hypixel Studios was acquired by Riot Games in 2020, shut down by Riot in June 2025, and went independent a few months later, the team is launching Hytale in early access on January 13th. And if […]

item.title: Une app qui demande si vous êtes mort fait un carton
item.description: « Est-ce que vous êtes mort ? ». Les utilisateurs d'une application très populaire en Chine doivent répondre à cette question un rien angoissante tous les deux jours, sinon l'app envoie un message à un contact d'urgence. Un peu glauque, mais pas si inutile finalement.

item.title: Scientists Think They’ve Cracked One of IVF’s Biggest Problems
item.description: An experimental injection could restore the youthfulness of eggs taken from older women.
